EmailTemplate.subject: Uncover Revenue Savings with Pivotal's BDS Tool
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do you use different data management solutions for your structured and unstructured data? Are you paying to manage all your data? If you answered yes to either of these questions, then you are locked into the wrong big data technology.
Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite?utm_source=c/big-data/&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pivotal-email-display-bigdata-nurture-q22014> is one integrated solution to merge the traditional and next generation data management requirements of your business. We have created a use-it-as-you-need-it pricing strategy so you can focus on Big Data analytics and applications while not having to pay for data storage. Pivotal CEO, Paul Maritz describes Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://bits.blogs.nytimes.com/2014/04/02/pivotal-offers-a-big-data-bundle/?_php=true&_type=blogs&_php=true&_type=blogs&_r=1> as "An easy way to buy not only Hadoop, but all the important layers on top of it."
Enter your current storage requirements to calculate annual revenue savings using Pivotal's Big Data Suite Value Tool.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
